description:
(Note: The MCMoby Platform can now be found at www.Kingside.com)


Electronic Marketing Is The Future …

In 2013 a new revolution of marketing is climbing towards its summit and guaranteed critical mass in the next few years. Now is the time to grasp pocket marketing and guarantee your spot in the hottest trend that is not going away. With MCMoby, you gain the capability to engage all of your marketing activities from one platform, including Mobile, Mobile Text, Email, Social Media and Affiliate / Internet marketing.

Learn Mobile CPA Marketing

Watch our detailed training lessons as we explain the in and out of mobile CPA marketing from anexpert who has made thousands a day using the methods taught in our training.

Learn Email Marketing

Learn from copywriting and email marketing gurus how to effectively use email marketing to generate cash on demand.

Learn Text Message Marketing

Learn the real truth about text message marketing and how to make it work in your business.

Learn Offline Marketing

Discover how to use mobile CPA, mobile websites, mobile landing pages and more work for your offline consulting or brick-and-mortar business.

Why Mobile Marketing?

Google calls mobile "To Big To Ignore". Why? Consider this:

6 billion: The number of mobile phone subscriptions worldwide by the end of 2011. That's more mobile phones than toothbrushes (4 Billion estimated).

2 million: number of items EBay sellers are posting each week from their smart phone.

$1.2 Billion: Mobile advertising spending in the United States during the first half of 2012.

Now is the time to learn everything you can about Mobile Marketing for a prosperous 2013

All of these lessons will teach you mobile marketing which may be done with several online resources.

The MCMoby Platform can now be found at http://kingside.com
title: Mobile Marketing University by MCMoby
